item.title: 瑞士正在自问：1000万人是否过多？
item.description:
当世界各国纷纷涌向达沃斯之际，东道国正考虑实施人口上限政策

【原文：

As the world flocks to Davos, the host country ponders a population cap

】

item.title: 波兰央行委员科特茨基称，波兰可能在2月就降息
item.description: 波兰货币政策委员会成员卢德维克·科特茨基表示，随着持续低通胀前景改善，波兰可能在下月再次降息，幅度为25个基点。【原文：Poland may return to interest rate cuts next month with a quarter-point reduction as prospects for continued low inflation improve, according to Monetary Policy Council member Ludwik Kotecki.】

item.title: 英国统计机构考虑推迟六个月开展新就业调查
item.description: 英国国家统计局已制定应急方案，将推迟六个月启动新的劳动力市场调查，这可能导致该机构在努力恢复国家经济数据公信力的过程中遭遇进一步延误。【原文：The UK statistics agency has drawn up contingency plans to delay the launch of its new labor market survey by six months, raising the possibility of a further holdup as it battles to restore the credibility of the country’s economic data.】

item.title: 马斯克旗下Grok人工智能因性化图像遭日本审查
item.description: 日本加入了日益增多的国家行列，就埃隆·马斯克的人工智能服务Grok及其聊天机器人未经当事人同意制造和传播性化图像的行为展开调查。【原文：Japan joined the growing list of countries probing X over Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence service Grok and the chatbot’s role in creating and spreading sexualized images of people without their consent.】

item.title: 日本与意大利将提升双边关系，在关键矿产领域加强合作
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗与意大利总理乔尔吉娅·梅洛尼同意在关键矿产供应领域加强合作，并将两国关系提升至新高度。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi and Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni agreed to work together on critical mineral supply and elevate their relationship to a new level.】

item.title: 日本财务大臣警告称将采取一切必要措施支撑日元汇率
item.description: 日本财务大臣重申警告称，为应对日元近期走弱，日本政府将采取包括直接干预汇率在内的所有必要措施。【原文：Japan’s finance minister reiterated her warning that all options including direct currency intervention are available for dealing with recent weakness in the yen.】

item.title: 台湾否认美台协议损害科技产业，台积电正加速海外布局
item.description: 台湾试图淡化外界对其科技产业因美台贸易协议而遭掏空的担忧，尽管台积电等芯片制造商已在美国投入数千亿美元。【原文：Taiwan sought to downplay concerns its tech industry is being hollowed out by a US trade deal, as Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. and other chipmakers invest hundreds of billions of dollars in America.】

item.title: 马来西亚季度经济增速飙升至5.7%，逆特朗普关税而上
item.description: 马来西亚第四季度经济增速超出预期，全年增长率也因此超越官方预测。强劲的服务业和制造业表现有效抵消了美国严苛关税的影响。【原文：Malaysia’s economy expanded faster than expected in the fourth quarter, helping full-year growth beat official estimates, as robust services and manufacturing helped counter the impact of tough US tariffs.】

item.title: 三菱以52亿美元收购美国Aethon天然气资产
item.description: 三菱商事同意以52亿美元收购Aethon能源管理公司的美国天然气及管道资产，这是日本企业在美页岩气领域最大规模的收购案。【原文：Mitsubishi Corp. agreed to buy Aethon Energy Management LLC’s US gas and pipeline assets for $5.2 billion, the biggest purchase by a Japanese company in the American shale sector.】

item.title: 伊朗无法指望TACO，因特朗普兑现威胁，英国《金融时报》称
item.description: 彭博经济研究显示，尽管美国总统特朗普暗示暂停对伊朗的攻击，但他在第二任期内兑现了更多威胁，这意味着伊朗面临的风险更高。【原文：Donald Trump is following through on a greater share of his threats in his second term, suggesting a higher risk for Iran even as the US president signals a pause in attacks on the country, a Bloomberg Economics report showed.】

item.title: 中国严打高频交易，金属价格下跌
item.description: 金属价格在动荡的一周结束时下跌，此前中国收紧高频交易监管。此举源于内地期货市场的狂热交易活动，该活动曾助推全球价格上涨。【原文：Metals fell at the end of a dramatic week, as China clamped down on high-frequency trading in a move that came after frenzied activity in mainland futures that helped to fuel global price gains.】

item.title: 全球公司债券收益率溢价降至2007年以来最低水平
item.description: 全球信贷市场的投资者正接受近二十年来最低的企业债务收益率溢价，这得益于经济前景的强劲韧性。【原文：Investors across global credit markets are accepting the lowest yield premiums on corporate debt in almost two decades, heartened by a resilient economic outlook.】

item.title: 印度投资者涌入金属股，白银、铜价飙升
item.description: 商品衍生品已成为散户交易者中的最新风潮。【原文：Commodity derivatives are the latest fad among retail traders.】

item.title: 万科债券延续涨势，因延长方案更具吸引力
item.description: 万科债券延续涨势，此前这家陷入困境的开发商提出更优惠的方案，将部分债券的偿付期限延长，这可能缓解其即将违约的风险。【原文：China Vanke Co.’s bonds extended their rally, a day after the distressed developer unveiled sweetened proposals to extend payments on some notes, potentially easing the risk of an imminent default.】

item.title: 暴雨扰乱澳大利亚冶金煤供应
item.description: 澳大利亚东北部持续强降雨引发的洪水正阻碍矿山作业，并导致该地区冶金用煤供应中断。【原文：Heavy rainfall in northeast Australia has triggered floods that are hampering mine operations and disrupting supplies of metallurgical coal in the region.】

item.title: 中国外汇兑换量飙升至历史新高，企业争相回归人民币
item.description: 中国银行12月协助客户将创纪录的外汇兑换回人民币，这主要受到人民币升值预期和季节性需求增加的推动。【原文：Chinese banks helped clients sell a record amount of foreign currencies back into the yuan in December, supercharged by expectations of appreciation and increased seasonal demand.】

item.title: 中国国家队ETF创纪录资金流出，市场降温信号显现
item.description: 周四，中国所谓"国家队"重仓持有的部分交易所交易基金遭遇创纪录资金流出，这一动向与抑制股市上涨的整体举措相呼应。【原文：Some of the exchange‑traded funds heavily owned by China’s so‑called national team saw record outflows on Thursday, a development that aligns with broader efforts to temper the stock market rally.】

item.title: 日本央行观察人士预计7月前将加息，日元汇率成关键变量
item.description: 多数日本央行观察人士认为，行长植田和男及其同僚在加息方面行动迟缓，并预计在基本情景下，下次加息仍需数月时间。【原文：Most Bank of Japan watchers judge that Governor Kazuo Ueda and his colleagues have been slow in ratcheting up interest rates, and expect the next move still to be several months away in their base case scenarios.】

item.title: 中国严打高频交易者，撤除数据服务器
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国正逐步取消高频交易商的核心优势，将这些公司专用的服务器从本土交易所的数据中心移出。【原文：China is pulling the plug on a key advantage held by high-frequency traders, removing servers dedicated to those firms out of local exchanges’ data centers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平达成贸易休战后，美国企业对中国重燃信心
item.description: 美国商会的一项调查显示，在特朗普总统与中国国家主席习近平达成贸易休战后，美国企业对中国市场的信心有所提升。【原文：US companies are more upbeat about doing business in China after a trade truce between President Donald Trump and Chinese leader Xi Jinping, according to a survey by the American Chamber of Commerce in China.】

item.title: OpenAI与微软错失避免与马斯克对簿公堂的最后机会
item.description: OpenAI公司与微软未能逃脱一场诉讼——埃隆·马斯克指控萨姆·奥尔特曼创立的初创企业背弃了其作为公共慈善机构的创始使命：该企业从软件巨头处获取数十亿美元资金后，竟计划转型为营利性企业运营。【原文：OpenAI Inc. and Microsoft failed to escape a trial over Elon Musk’s claims that Sam Altman’s startup betrayed its founding mission as a public charity when it took billions in funding from a software giant and made plans to operate as a for-profit business.】

item.title: 中国1.2万亿美元意外之财悄然渗入全球市场
item.description: 中国创纪录的贸易顺差正席卷全球，曾经流入国库的出口收益如今正用于大规模购买海外证券和拓展海外业务。【原文：A record trade surplus racked up by China is washing up around the world, as export earnings that once ended up in state coffers instead fund massive private purchases of overseas securities and business expansion abroad.】

item.title: EM基金击败97%同行，称内存芯片是最佳投资选择
item.description: ClearBridge Investments新兴市场股票基金经理迪维娅·马图尔表示，随着人工智能在未来十年持续推高芯片需求，存储芯片股将成为投资首选。【原文：Memory stocks are the place to be as artificial intelligence continues to push up chip demand over the next decade, according to emerging‑market equity fund manager Divya Mathur at ClearBridge Investments.】

item.title: 银价暴涨重创太阳能制造商，这些企业本已深陷亏损困境
item.description: 银价飙升正给太阳能电池板制造商带来额外压力，这些企业正试图在行业激烈竞争中结束长达两年的亏损局面。【原文：Soaring prices for silver are putting an extra squeeze on solar panel makers as they look to end more than two years of losses amid brutal competition in the sector.】

item.title: 台积电黄仁勋表示，管理外汇风险的关键在于保持简单
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造公司（TSMC）的黄仁圜指出，当一家公司在小型经济体中占据主导地位且拥有巨额海外收入时，应对汇率市场波动风险的最佳方式就是保持简单。【原文：When you’re a dominant company in a small economy with huge overseas earnings, the best way to manage your exposure to the vagaries of the currency market is to keep it simple, according to Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s Wendell Huang.】

item.title: 美国暂停关键矿物进口关税后，白银价格下跌
item.description: 银价在早盘小幅收跌后继续走低，因投资者对美国决定暂不征收关键矿物关税的消息反应平淡。【原文：Silver dipped after ending the earlier session marginally lower, as investors looked past the US decision to refrain from imposing tariffs on critical minerals.】

item.title: 油价录得6月以来最大跌幅，因伊朗担忧情绪消退
item.description: 油价在创下6月以来最大跌幅后企稳，因美国表示将暂缓对伊朗采取军事行动。【原文：Oil steadied after its biggest decline since June as the US indicated it would hold off on attacking Iran for now.】

item.title: 日元观察者面临双重打击：日本央行政策与选举不确定性
item.description: 随着日本央行下周会议临近，该国突然举行大选的不确定性日益加剧，日元交易员正因货币可能再度波动的风险而如坐针毡。【原文：Yen traders are on edge for the risk of renewed volatility in the currency as uncertainty over the nation’s snap election grows with a Bank of Japan meeting approaching next week.】

item.title: 亚洲市场长期秉持的一项信条正突然瓦解
item.description: 亚洲股市与本币汇率之间的关联性出现断裂，正向全球基金发出信号，促使它们重新审视在该地区的投资策略。【原文：A breakdown in the relationship between Asia’s stocks and its currencies is flashing a signal for global funds to rethink their investment strategy in the region.】

item.title: 台积电瞄准缩小美台芯片制造技术差距
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司未来将加速向美国转移其先进芯片制造技术，但仍将在本土研发并维持最尖端的制造工艺。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. will try to accelerate the transfer of its advanced chipmaking expertise to the US in the future, though it will still develop and maintain its most cutting-edge fabrication techniques at home.】
